name: The Train to Smithfield
description:
GAME IS NOT COMPLETE (6/2020).  

You're on the train to Smithfield, a town in the middle of nowhere.  Things take an unexpected turn, and it is up to you to work out how to set things right.  

(Young Adults 15+)  No sexual situations, some violence.  May be too wordy for younger people.  Expected play time: 30-40 minutes.
